data.description:
Play the drums like a rock hero, and survive in hell fighting against demons and their boss!

Characteristics:
-Real Rock! Hard rock, heavy metal, Nu metal, among others. A wide variety of rock, with original music or hit groups!
-Stylish and crazy graphics, with a brutal finishing level
-TRUE Drums Set! A drums set that you will have to play and you can customize!
-More than 4h of only CAMPAIGN! Plus all the extras!
-Dozens of unlockables! Drumsticks, drums, songs...
-Intuitive gameplay for everyone. No dizziness. Play in a chair.
- Feel the rock n roll with advanced levels, make flourishes with the sticks and master the drums.
-PHASE enemies and boss, special levels and different worlds to discover.
-Online Ranking! Compete against your friends and beat their scores.
-Musical versions of other videogames!! Watch out!
-4 levels of difficulty! For all levels and with a fair progression!

· New Boss (Unarmed Guitarist) on Rule The Night song! You can confront this boss in Campaign Mode at the final Chapter of Act 2

· Added the option to choose between the two different modes to display double notes
· Added the option to adjust volume for the music drums and the drums fx
· Added a UI element on the scene showing the perfect spot to hit a note
· Bug fixing

The first update of Drums ROCK is now available.

The Rock of Ages update is headlined by the addition of I love rock'n roll and the Ruski Bruski song.

New songs:
- I love rock'n roll - Joan Jett & Blackhearts (You will find it in the campaign and unlocked from the beginning)
- Ruski Bruski - Professor Plumb (In the store you can buy this song)

Game Improvements:
- The size of the obese has been reduced to improve visibility
- Roll tracking for the obese has been improved
- Siamese tracking has been improved
- Adjusted S rank on hard so it's not impossible now
- Store prices have been adjusted, now everything is cheaper.
- Added position system setup for drums
- Now you can preview all songs in challenge mode
- The desert scenario has been optimized
- The stars required to progress in the campaign have been reduced
- Variations of Boxing Gloves and Blindness have been improved.
- Challenge Scrollbar Fixed
- Fixed various bugs
